textType: R&D space located at Da Nang Software Center
The most dynamic technology hub in Central Vietnam

aboutDAB.description: R&D space located at the Da Nang Software Center — the most dynamic technology hub in Central Vietnam.

features.title: Project-Based
features.description: Participating companies on a project-basis, flexible and efficient

features.title: Sandbox Policy
features.description: Benefit from the city's sandbox policy for AI and new technologies

features.title: Testing Environment
features.description: Flexible environment, reduced legal barriers, accelerated innovation

whyChoose.title: Why choose
whyChoose.description: We bring unique advantages that help your business grow quickly and sustainably

advantages.title: Sandbox Policy
advantages.description: Da Nang is piloting special mechanisms for AI, fintech, blockchain

advantages.title: Optimal costs
advantages.description: 40-50% lower operating costs compared to Ho Chi Minh City and Hanoi

advantages.title: Quality of life
advantages.description: Most liveable city, attracting and retaining tech talent

advantages.title: Ecosystem
advantages.description: Direct connection with government, universities, and startup community

cityFeatures.title: Strategic location
cityFeatures.description: Central Vietnam hub with convenient connectivity to major cities and ASEAN countries

cityFeatures.title: Preferential policies
cityFeatures.description: Special policies for AI, fintech, blockchain from local government

cityFeatures.title: Innovation environment
cityFeatures.description: Modern coastal city with comfortable and innovative working environment

forWho.title: Who is
forWho.description: We serve various entities from startups to large enterprises, from local to international teams

targetAudience.title: Technology companies

forWho.ecosystemDescription: DAB-Lab is not just a workspace, but a complete ecosystem with all the necessary elements for you to develop and succeed.

features.title: Our Core Capabilities
features.description: Combining blockchain technology and artificial intelligence to create innovative solutions for the future

items.title: Blockchain Innovation
items.description: Developing secure and scalable blockchain solutions for enterprise and public applications.

items.title: Artificial Intelligence
items.description: Creating AI models tailored for Vietnamese language, culture, and business needs.

items.title: Security First
items.description: Implementing world-class security protocols to protect data and transactions.

items.title: High Performance
items.description: Optimizing systems for speed and efficiency without compromising quality.

items.title: Data Analytics
items.description: Advanced analytics and insights powered by machine learning algorithms.

items.title: Smart Contracts
items.description: Developing intelligent smart contracts for automation and transparency.

location.title: Located in Beautiful Da Nang
location.description: A coastal paradise where innovation meets nature - the perfect environment for creativity and breakthrough research

features.title: Strategic Location
features.description: Da Nang is Vietnam's most liveable city, positioned perfectly in Central Vietnam with world-class infrastructure and connectivity to major tech hubs across Asia.

features.title: Coastal Inspiration
features.description: Surrounded by pristine beaches and the Han River, our location offers a refreshing environment that stimulates creativity and innovation.

features.title: Year-Round Excellence
features.description: Perfect climate and modern amenities make Da Nang an ideal location for attracting top talent from around the world.

features.title: Cultural Heritage
features.description: Close proximity to UNESCO World Heritage sites like Hoi An Ancient Town and the Imperial City of Hue provides rich cultural context for our work.

contact.title: Ready to build with DAB-Lab?
contact.description: Sign up for a lab tour or schedule a discussion. Let's build the future of AI in Da Nang together.
